scripts.reset: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $session = (Resolve-Path '.\.wwebjs_auth\session').Path; Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'chrome.exe' -and $_.CommandLine -match '\\.cache\\puppeteer\\chrome' -and $_.CommandLine -match [regex]::Escape($session) } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -match '^node(\.exe)?$' -and $_.CommandLine -match 'index\.js' } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; node index.js"
